激活的卡片: {"cost":{"最高力量":8},"params":"${ const maxPart = {(store.state.stat.mining_scrapMax.total)}^{0.5}; const timePart = store.getters['mining/depthScrap'](store.state.stat[`mining_maxDepth${store.state.system.features.mining.currentSubfeature}`].value)  \\cdot  1200; return [maxPart, timePart, maxPart + timePart]; }$","description":"$[formatNum(params[2])]$","formula":"$[formatNum(params[0]), formatNum(params[1])]$","disabled":"$store.state.system.features.mining.currentSubfeature !== 0 || store.state.cryolab.mining.激活的卡片$","trigger":"${ store.dispatch('currency/gain', { feature: 'mining', name: '废料', amount: params[2] }); }$"}

{"cost":{"最高力量":10},"params":"$[store.state.currency.树脂.cap]$","description":"$[]$","formula":"$[formatNum(params[0])]$","disabled":"$store.state.system.features.mining.currentSubfeature !== 0 || store.state.cryolab.mining.激活的卡片$","trigger":"${ store.dispatch('currency/gain', { feature: 'mining', name: '树脂', amount: params[0] }); }$"}
